Scripts.OnShow: self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", GameTooltip, "TOPRIGHT") if self.TextLeft1:GetWidth() > 230 then self.TextLeft1:SetWidth( 230 ); end self:SetWidth( self.TextLeft1:GetWidth() + 20 ); self:SetHeight( self.TextLeft1:GetHeight() + 20 ) if self:GetRight() and self:GetRight() > GetScreenWidth() then self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", GameTooltip, "BOTTOMLEFT") end if self:GetBottom() and 0 > self:GetBottom() then self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", GameTooltip, "TOPLEFT") end if self:GetTop() and self:GetTop() > GetScreenHeight() then self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", GameTooltip, "TOPLEFT", 0, -45) end

Scripts.OnEnter:
local trait = DiceMaster4.inspectData[self:GetParent():GetParent().traitPlayer].traits[self:GetParent():GetParent().traitIndex]
if self:GetParent():GetParent().traitPlayer == UnitName("player") and ( self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent()==DiceMasterPanel or self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent()==DiceMasterTraitEditor ) then if trait["effects"]["secret"] then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine( "|TInterface/AddOns/DiceMaster/Texture/secret-icon:12|t Secret!" , 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine( trait["effects"]["secret"]["desc1"], 1, 0.49, 1, 1) local conditionsList = "" local count = 0 for k, v in pairs( trait["effects"]["secret"]["conditions1"] ) do if k then count = count + 1 end k = k:gsub( "%.%.%.", "" ) if count == 1 then conditionsList = "- " .. k .. "." else conditionsList = conditionsList .. "|n- " .. k .. "." end end GameTooltip:AddLine( "|cFFFFD100This secret is activated when...|r|n"..conditionsList , 1, 1, 1) if self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent()==DiceMasterPanel then GameTooltip:AddLine( "<Right Click to Disable>" , 0.44, 0.44, 0.44) end GameTooltip:Show() end else GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine( "|TInterface/AddOns/DiceMaster/Texture/secret-icon:12|t Secret!" , 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine( "This secret is revealed when activated by a specific condition.", 0.44, 0.44, 0.44, 1) GameTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnClick: if button=="RightButton" and self:GetParent():GetParent().traitPlayer == UnitName("player") and self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent()==DiceMasterPanel then DiceMaster4.Profile.traits[self:GetParent():GetParent().traitIndex].secret1Active = false; DiceMaster4.Profile.traits[self:GetParent():GetParent().traitIndex].secret1Enabled = false; self:Hide() PlaySound(857) print("|cFFFFFF00You have disabled |cFF67BCFF["..DiceMaster4.Profile.traits[self:GetParent():GetParent().traitIndex].name.."]|r's |TInterface/AddOns/DiceMaster/Texture/secret-icon:12|t |cFFFFFFFFSecret!|r|r") DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_Refresh() if IsInRaid( LE_PARTY_CATEGORY_HOME ) then DiceMaster4.Inspect_SendTraits( "RAID", nil ) elseif IsInGroup( LE_PARTY_CATEGORY_HOME ) then DiceMaster4.Inspect_SendTraits( "PARTY", nil ) end end
